ModuleTitle: Making Sense of Regions in South Asia
ModuleDescription:
This module interrogates the concept of the ‘region’
and considers processes which have shaped regionmaking.
The ways in which regions contribute to the
diversity of South Asia are discussed. The role of
language, culture and cuisine in shaping regional
identities is also explored. Finally, the complex
relationship between region and nation is examined
using specific case-studies across South Asia.
